glsa.title: Adobe Flash Player: Remote execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: The Adobe Flash Player is a renderer for the SWF file format, which is commonly used to provide interactive websites.

description.p: A critical type confusion vulnerability was discovered in Adobe Flash Player.

impact.p: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Adobe Flash Player users should upgrade to the latest version:
